articles.author: James Vincent
articles.title: AI camera operator repeatedly confuses bald head for soccer ball during live stream - The Verge
articles.description: An AI camera operator with ‘ball-tracking technology’ infuriated soccer fans last month when it kept on confusing a linesman’s bald head for the soccer ball. The technology was deployed to unintentionally hilarious effect by Inverness Caledonian Thistle FC.
articles.content:
Filed under:
Like a distracted AI with a crush
Wheres the ball? Theres the ball, get it!
